banners.sourceText: But in the days of the sounding of the seventh angel...

item1.title: ...It's later than we think
item1.subtitle: Redeeming the time, because the days are evil.

item2.title: ...This Temple
item2.subtitle: It is written, My house shall be called the house of prayer

item3.title: Those old songs just thrill me. They’re inspiring.
item3.subtitle: 58-0109 - The Called-Out

item1.description: I want you to remember that your first step, somebody led you. And your last step, somebody will be leading you.

item2.description: You can learn the Message that we are trying to teach, but still that won't give you Eternal Life. You've got to accept the Person, Jesus Christ.

item3.description: Wherewithal shall a young man cleanse his way? by taking heed thereto according to thy word. With my whole heart have I sought thee: O let me not wander from thy commandments.

item4.description: It’s a anchor of a Divine faith that calls anything contrary to the Word of God as though it wasn’t. It puts new Life. It gives hope to the dying. It gives courage to the weak. It gives healing to the sick.
